contest-event.event-date:
June 27, 1931 D Newcastle Contest
Newcastle Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Newcastle upon Tyne Contest newcastle-contest
Test Piece Contest
La Favorita
Cricket Field, Bath Road, Newcastle 14 bands competed
Prizes 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £14 and shield, 3rd £8, 4th £5, 5th £2.
March contest 1st (£2) Hetton Silver, 2nd(£1) Brancepeth.
Deportment: 1. St Hilda, 2. Hetton
Best trombone and euphonium - Wallsend, best cornet and horn - Brancepeth.
Sponsored by Newcastle Evening Chronicle.
Source The Musical Progress and Mail August 1931.
Oct. 12, 2012, 4:22 p.m. Dec. 12, 2018, 8:36 p.m.
1 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
2 Wallsend Borough Band Jack Boddice
3 Urpeth Colliery J. Young
4 Middlesbrough Borough James Wilson Jnr
5 Backworth Colliery Band George Hawkins
Unknown Result St Hilda Colliery (New) Unknown
